author: robbie
msg: QPID-2870: move the authorisation check outside the AtomicBoolean wrapped queue deletion process to prevent an unauthorised attempt from barring all future deletion attempts

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2695: use exchangeName variable instead of exchange variable when logging during binding recovery to guard against NPEs, and check for exchange presence to prevent the BindingFactory incorrectly binding to the default exchange

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2704: simplify the implementation of SQEL scavenge() ability and add test.

author: robbie
msg: Remove old commented out conflict marker, erroneous println debugging statement. Correct exception message.
